name: The power of wikis, the problem with social networks, the promise of AI with Evan Prodromou (The Changelog #257)
summary: Evan Prodromou has been involved in open source since the mid ‘90s. His open source travel guide – Wikitravel – grew up alongside Wikipedia and the web itself. In this episode, we hear Evan’s history, try to solve open social networking once and for all, and learn how sprinkling a little artificial intelligence on to o...
